sentences.sContent: And there are any metallic connectives on this bed, joggle is between bed leg and bedplate, craftsman certains ably good mortise, this bed combination is together.
sentences.sContent_eng: And there are any metallic connectives on this bed, joggle is between bed leg and bedplate, craftsman certains ably good mortise, this bed combination is together.
sentences.sCn: 并且这个床上没有任何金属连接物，床腿和床板之间都是榫接的，工匠巧妙地凿好榫眼，将这个床组合在一起。

trans.tranOther: a hole cut in a piece of wood or stone so that the shaped end of another piece will fit there firmly
